content.raw:
Is there a way to tell which side of the solar panel is the top?  When it opens, the red button is diagonally opposite the connection port, but I can't tell which side the port will be on until it pops open.  If we want it to land with the connector closer to the right side of the table, then we need to orient it properly before hitting the button.

Looking at the model, the solar panel appears symmetric when closed.

Is there a way to tell which side of the solar panel is the top? When it opens, the red button is diagonally opposite the connection port, but I can't tell which side the port will be on until it pops open. If we want it to land with the connector closer to the right side of the table, then we need to orient it properly before hitting the button.

Looking at the model, the solar panel appears symmetric when closed.
